content: fingerprint puppets these unique finger puppets were designed for knitting4peace and their 2025 create-a-thon since their founding in 2006 knitting4peace have delivered handmade items to nearly 250 000 people living in communities across the united states and 84 countries around the world currently all of the finger puppets donated are sent to baby and infant clinics for use in language development children use them to talk to their siblings and parents use them to talk to their babies for this reason adult sized puppets are most needed to learn how finger puppets can
